name: Kerntechnik Deutschland e. V.
goal: KernD aims to inform the public, media, social and political stakeholders about nuclear technology and nuclear energy and provide a network for the nuclear sector in Germany in industry and research. A major priority is to uphold competency in nuclear in Germany and support educational activities.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Sustainable Finance Initiative, Taxonomy Technical Report
Energy Union, Radiation Protection Regulation, ENEF, ENSREG, EU Stress Test
